video_prompt: A minimalist clock face dissolves into scattered, glowing particles, dispersing outwards from 9 to 12 o'clock, conveying the fluid transience of time.
image_prompt: Minimalist clock face with black hour markers and hands (set to 11:55) dissolving into scattering white spherical particles, creating a sense of time passing. Gradient gray background. Grayscale, abstract, ethereal.
refined_video_prompt: A clock's structure fluidly melts, its form transforming into radiant, scattered particles. These particles rapidly flow outwards, swirling and propagating from the nine o'clock region towards the twelve, continuously shifting, dispersing, and fading across the frame.
